meanings.definition: A disease of plants caused by a fungus.
meanings.sent1: The farmer noticed the clubroot affecting his crops.
meanings.sent2: The garden was struggling with clubroot, making the plants wilt.
meanings.sent3: The clubroot on the plants seemed to be having a party of its own.
meanings.sent4: The clubroot spread through the garden like a silent invader.
meanings.sent5: The clubroot disease turned the once vibrant garden into a scene of despair.

meanings.definition: A club-shaped swelling on the roots of infected plants.
meanings.sent1: The scientist observed the clubroot on the roots under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The farmer dug up the plants and found clubroot on the roots.
meanings.sent3: The clubroot on the roots looked like tiny clubs growing underground.
meanings.sent4: The clubroot on the roots was a strange sight in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The clubroot on the roots twisted and deformed the once healthy plants.
